media_manager.plugins.common.GenericPlugin module¶

Copyright 2015,2016 Hermann Krumrey

This file is part of media-manager.

media-manager is a program that allows convenient managing of various local media collections, mostly focused on video.

class media_manager.plugins.common.GenericPlugin.GenericPlugin[source]¶

Bases: object

Generic Plugin that serves as a unified interface for the plugins.

get_command_name()[source]¶
Returns:the command that starts ths plugin
get_config_tag()[source]¶
Returns:the config tag of this plugin
get_name()[source]¶
Returns:the name of this plugin
get_parser_arguments()[source]¶
Returns:tuple of two list of dictionaries, consisting of argument tags and descriptions. the first tuple element contains boolean values, the others store string values
start_args_parse(args)[source]¶

Runs the plugin in arg parse mode

start_cli(parent_cli)[source]¶

Starts the CLI of the plugin :param parent_cli: the parent cli :return: void

start_gui(parent_gui)[source]¶

Starts the GUI of the plugin :param parent_gui: the gui’s parent :return: void
